New Records: LeBron James scored 11 points, six rebounds, and four assists in 15 minutes during the Lakers' 107-102 preseason win over the Bucks on October 11, 2024.
Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Milwaukee Bucks 107-102 in their preseason game on October 11, 2024.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James highlighted the joy of playing with his son, Bronny James, during the Lakers' media day and preparation for the game.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort and the opportunity to play alongside his son during the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James' stats from the game included 11 points, six rebounds, and four assists, while Bronny James did not play together with his father in this particular game.
Others: The Lakers improved to a 1-2 preseason record with three more games left, including matchups against the Golden State Warriors and the Phoenix Suns.
